Item.comments: instantiates action items from template (this context) and add then to defined relationship
Item.method_code:
' This (Me) context must be of type "gAction Item Template" !! ' ' addl. arguments are passed in as custom attributes of the item context ' ' <Item type="gAction Item Template" .. actionItemSourceItemType=".." actionItemSourceItemId=".." ' ' if actionRelationshipName is not set, then only the actionItem item is created and returned ' else the action item is created and connected to the defined relationship assuming thisItem to be the source item ' 'MethodTemplateName=VBMain; Dim inn As Innovator = Me.getInnovator()
Function Main() As Item 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break() Dim actionTemplId As String = Me.getID() Dim actionItemSourceItemType As String = Me.getAttribute("actionItemSourceItemType","") Dim actionItemSourceItemId As String = Me.getAttribute("actionItemSourceItemId","") Dim actionTemplActionType As String = Me.getProperty("action_item_type","generic_action") Dim isAddRelatedActionItems As String = Me.getProperty("is_add_related_action_items","0") Dim isStartRelatedActionItems As String = Me.getProperty("is_start_related_action_items","0")
If actionItemSourceItemType = "" Or actionItemSourceItemId = "" Then inn.newError("Method 'gAction Instantiate From Templ' failed. Missing arguments 'actionItemSourceItemType' or 'actionItemSourceItemId'") End If
'get target relationship's name Dim itm As Item = Me.newItem("","") itm.loadAML("<Item type='RelationshipType' action='get' select='name' id='" & Me.getProperty("action_item_target_relationship","invalid") & "' />") itm = itm.apply("") If itm.isError() Then Return itm
Dim targetRelshipName As String = itm.getProperty("name","")
'get all template actions, then loop to copy to new target relationship Dim amlCmd As String = "<Item type='gAction Item Template Action' action='get' select='*' >" & _ "<source_id>" & actionTemplId & "</source_id>" & _ "</Item>"
Dim templActions As Item = Me.newItem("","") templActions.loadAML(amlCmd) templActions = templActions.apply()
Dim dtNow As DateTime = System.DateTime.UtcNow Dim tmpPtrn As String = "yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss" Dim sCntxt As I18NSessionContext = Me.getInnovator().getI18NSessionContext()
Dim i As Integer For i=0 To templActions.getItemCount()-1 itm = Me.newItem(actionItemSourceItemType,"")
'call server method itm.setID(actionItemSourceItemId)
Dim actionType As String = Me.getAttribute("actionType","generic_action")
itm.setAttribute("actionType",actionTemplActionType) itm.setAttribute("actionRelationshipName",targetRelshipName) itm.setAttribute("addRelatedActionItem",isAddRelatedActionItems) itm.setAttribute("startRelatedActionItem",isStartRelatedActionItems) itm.setAttribute("closingNotesRequired",templActions.getItemByIndex(i).getProperty("is_closing_notes_required",""))
itm.setAttribute("actionOwnerId",resolveIdentityID(templActions.getItemByIndex(i).getProperty("owned_by_id",""),actionItemSourceItemType,actionItemSourceItemId)) itm.setAttribute("actionManagerId",resolveIdentityID(templActions.getItemByIndex(i).getProperty("managed_by_id",""),actionItemSourceItemType,actionItemSourceItemId)) itm.setAttribute("actionDescr",templActions.getItemByIndex(i).getProperty("action_item_description","")) itm.setAttribute("actionPriority",templActions.getItemByIndex(i).getProperty("action_priority",""))
Dim dueDateOffset As Integer = templActions.getItemByIndex(i).getProperty("action_due_date_offset_days","0") If dueDateOffset > 0 Then Dim dueDate As DateTime = dtNow.AddDays(dueDateOffset) Dim tmpDt As String = dueDate.toString(tmpPtrn, DateTimeFormatInfo.InvariantInfo) itm.setAttribute("actionDueDate",sCntxt.ConvertUtcDateTimeToNeutral(tmpDt, tmpPtrn)) End If itm = itm.apply("gAction Item add ActionRelation") If itm.isError() Then Return itm
Next i
Dim relationshipName As String = Me.getAttribute("actionRelationshipName","") Dim actionOwnerId As String = Me.getAttribute("actionOwnerId","")
Return Me End Function
'------ Private Function resolveIdentityID(thisIdentityId As String, sourceItemType As String, sourceItemId As String) As String If thisIdentityId = "" Then Return ""
Dim retIdentityId As String = thisIdentityId Dim identityProp As String = ""
' resolve OwnerManagerCreatorFromSourceItem Select Case (thisIdentityId) Case "8FE5430B42014D94AE83246F299D9CC4" ' Aras system Identity "Creator" retIdentityId = "" identityProp = "created_by_id" Case "538B300BB2A347F396C436E9EEE1976C" ' Aras system Identity "Owner" retIdentityId = "" identityProp = "owned_by_id" Case "9200A800443E4A5AAA80D0BCE5760307" ' Aras system Identity "Manager" retIdentityId = "" identityProp = "managed_by_id" End Select
' if sourceItem does not have a value If retIdentityId = "" Then Dim srcItem As Item = Me.getInnovator().getItemByID(sourceItemType,sourceItemId) identityProp = srcItem.getProperty(identityProp,"") If retIdentityId = "" Then Dim aliasId As String = Me.getInnovator().getUserAliases() If (aliasId <> "") Then aliasId = aliasId.Substring(0,32) Dim AliasItem As Item = Me.getInnovator().getItemById("Identity", aliasId) If (AliasItem.getItemCount() =1) Then retIdentityId = AliasItem.getAttribute("id") End If End If End If End If
Return retIdentityId
End Function
